014package org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper;
015
016import java.util.Optional;
017
018import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
019import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.QualifiedType;
020import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.Qualifiers;
021
022/**
023 * Factory interface used to produce column mappers.
024 */
025@FunctionalInterface
026public interface QualifiedColumnMapperFactory {
027    /**
028     * Supplies a column mapper which will map columns to type if the factory supports it; empty
029     * otherwise.
030     *
031     * @param type   the target qualified type to map to
032     * @param config the config registry, for composition
033     * @return a column mapper for the given type if this factory supports it, or <code>Optional.empty()</code> otherwise.
034     * @see ColumnMappers for composition
035     * @see QualifiedType
036     */
037    Optional<ColumnMapper<?>> build(QualifiedType<?> type, ConfigRegistry config);
038
039    /**
040     * Adapts a {@link ColumnMapperFactory} into a QualifiedColumnMapperFactory. The returned
041     * factory only matches qualified types with zero qualifiers.
042     *
043     * @param factory the factory to adapt
044     */
045    static QualifiedColumnMapperFactory adapt(ColumnMapperFactory factory) {
046        return (type, config) -> type.getQualifiers().equals(
047                config.get(Qualifiers.class).findFor(factory.getClass()))
048            ? factory.build(type.getType(), config)
049            : Optional.empty();
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * Create a QualifiedColumnMapperFactory from a given {@link ColumnMapper} that matches
054     * a single {@link QualifiedType} exactly.
055     *
056     * @param type the mapped type
057     * @param mapper the mapper
058     * @param <T> the mapped type
059     * @return A {@link QualifiedColumnMapperFactory}
060     */
061    static <T> QualifiedColumnMapperFactory of(QualifiedType<T> type, ColumnMapper<T> mapper) {
062        return (t, config) -> t.equals(type) ? Optional.of(mapper) : Optional.empty();
063    }
064}
